name: Exam Tank Game (AiWantToD-Ai)
description:
Aim with the mouse, hold and release left mouse to shoot. If you have Lindsay mode enabled, you can trigger a Cluster Bomb with space in most levels.

You can use the number keys to switch between levels (level 10 is on the 0 key) - press Q to return to the menu, or R to reload the current level. On the elevator level, use W and S to move up/down.

  • Level 1: Introduction
  • Level 2: Black Holes
  • Level 3: Homing Missiles
  • Level 4: Shield
  • Level 5: Moving Bouncy Barriers
  • Level 6: Cluster Bomb
  • Level 7: Laser Web
  • Level 8: Scrolling and Minions
  • Level 9: Elevator
  • Level 10: secret
Resources
  • Tanks, bullets, shield, explosion sprites by Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/assets/tanks)
  • Black Hole sprite from Scribblenauts Unlimited by 5th Cell (https://scribblenauts.fandom.com/wiki/Black_Hole)
